mapper.select: select c.competition_id,c.competition_name,c.start_date,c.end_date,c."location",c.host_organization,c.event_level,c.status, e.id,e.name,e.category,e.rules,e.start_time from competition_info c left join events e on c.competition_id = e.competition_id left join player_matches pm on e.id = pm.events_id where pm.user_id=#{id}
select e.id from events e left join competition_info c on e.competition_id = c.competition_id where c.competition_id = #{competitionId}
